alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Houston, north central Decatur, Miller, southwestern Baker, southern Early and northern Seminole Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 424 PM EDT/324 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Columbia to near Donalsonville to 6 miles southeast of Colquitt. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Donalsonville, Gordon, Iron City, Damascus, Brinson, Jakin, Saffold, Ausmac, Babcock, Crosby, Little Hope, Mayhaw, Decatur Co A/P, Boykin, Riverturn, Sharphagen, Donaldsonville A/P, Farley Nuclear Plant and Bellview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
